Content: Reload your <font color='#C7A758'>Pistol</font>, instantly refreshing the <font color='#CCFF22'>Shoot Pistol</font> skill.

Shoot your equipped pistol at a target, dealing [1].
Bullets fired from a pistol travel in a straight line, well beyond your limited targeting range.
When firing from a different elevation than your target, the bullet will travel at an angle.[2][3]
